alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:04AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Benton, central Delaware and east central Mayes Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 404 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Spavinaw, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bella Vista... Jay... Gravette... Spavinaw... Hoot Owl... Spavinaw State Park... Maysville... Hiwasse... Chloeta... Dodge... Lake Eucha State Park... Zena... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
